description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Jake Wharton - Android developer at Square

ABSTRACT
Development on the next major version of RxJava is underway. While the operators remain largely unchanged, Observable creation, subscription management, and backpressure has been completely overhauled in this new version. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7706

title: Exploring RxJava 2 for Android
